1:
Akai had no shoes.
Other children had good shoes.
2: Akai told her mother that it is difficult to play without shoes.
3: Mother saw that only Akai and Etabo had no shoes.
4: Mother woke up Akai the following morning.
5: Akai and her mother went to the market.
6: Akai and her mother went into a shoe shop.
7: At night, Akai thought about her new shoes.
8: Akai put on her new shoes.
9: Akai thought about how she would show off her shoes.
10: Akai wore her new shoes again and danced around the room.
11: Mother told Akai not to wear her shoes in bed.
12: Akai was so happy to have shoes for the first time.
